SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT051
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message provides statistical data for all closed GPA or FIN sessions during the requested time period. The report is the response to an MT 031 Session History Request.
From: GPA or FIN To: User
============ ========== Notes
Notes The session information provided in the report is the same as that given in the session line of a QUIT or LOGOUT acknowledgement including: • session number • date and time the session was opened • date and time the session was closed • a reason code, indicating the reason for the closure • number of messages sent (ISNs used) in that session • number of messages received (OSNs used) in that session • first and last ISN used in that session • first and last OSN used in that session. For each LT, a separate total number of messages sent and received for all the sessions listed, is also stated. See also the MT 081 Daily Check Report, which provides similar information on a daily basis. In a major system failure (SP level 3 recovery), some session data may be irrecoverable. This data is shown as zeros in field 331:<session-info>. The 30 day period is a rolling window of exactly 30 x 24 hours back from the moment of the request, eg, if the request is sent at 11:05 local time, the report will provide information as from 11:05 local time 30 x 24 hours ago.

SystemField.Name: section-number
SystemField.description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, identifying the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: section-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, identifying the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SystemField.Name: total-sections
SystemField.description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: total-sections
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SystemField.Name: session-info
SystemField.description:
Session information, including:
a) session number
b) date session opened
c) time session opened
d) date session closed
e) time session closed
f) reason for closure
g) quantity of messages sent
h) quantity of messages received
i) first ISN
j) last ISN
k) first OSN
l) last OSN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: session-info
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Session information, including:
a) session number
b) date session opened
c) time session opened
d) date session closed
e) time session closed
f) reason for closure
g) quantity of messages sent
h) quantity of messages received
i) first ISN
j) last ISN
k) first OSN
l) last OSN

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Session-Opened-Date '" + $value + "'. session-opened-date should be in the format yyMMdd."
"Invalid Session-Opened-Time '" + $value + "'. session-opened-time should be in the format HHmm."
"Invalid Session-Closed-Date '" + $value + "'. session-closed-date should be in the format yyMMdd."
"Invalid Session-Closed-Time '" + $value + "'. session-closed-time should be in the format HHmm."

SystemField.Name: lt-summary
SystemField.description:
LT summary, including:
a) total messages sent
b) total messages received

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-summary
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
LT summary, including:
a) total messages sent
b) total messages received
